name: Dark Youtube - Multicolor - BvD
description:
Clean dark theme with adjustable accent color.
Developed for Chrome but will work with other browsers too with possibly some little differences.
You can adjust this theme by clicking "Advanced Style Settings".
                                                                     â–¼
It would be great if you could support my work with a small donation :)
additional_info:
This project was intended for myself but the whole thing got a little out of hand due to the immense size of the website.
Since i only use a portion of what youtube has to offer, i decided to leave it at this and upload it.
If this turns out to become a popular theme then i might expand it further to cover more.

style_setting_options.label: Clean up
